{{Infobox University |name = Central University of Technology, Free State |image
= |motto = Thinking Beyond |established = 1981 |type = Public University of
Technology |staff = 800 |vice_chancellor = Prof. Thandwa Mthembu |students =
10,478 |city = Bloemfontein |state = Free State |country = South Africa |website
= }} 'Central University of Technology, Free State' or 'Central University of
Technology' is a University of Technology in Bloemfontein in the Free State
province of South Africa. It was established in 1981 as "Technikon Free State".
As part of the South African government's restructuring of tertiary education
for the new millennium it was promoted to university of technology status.
Currently the University is undergoing restructuring of personnel.
categories: Universities in the Free State (South African province)
